title: Tour de Hologram Microcosm
description:
The Hologram Microcosm is a clockable multi-effect pedal with a variety of algorithms designed to add rhythm, texture, space, and more to your sounds. In this video we'll run a variety of software instruments through it, one per algorithm, to see how it reacts.

https://www.hologramelectronics.com/microcosm

Watch the Microcosm make love to the Digitakt: https://youtu.be/2HBXJzJcPjE

This video is sponsored by Hologram.

30:28 outro
